scripts.format: npm run format:json && npm run format:yml && npm run format:md && npm run format:js
scripts.generate:pdf: mkdir -p dist && ./node_modules/resume-cli/index.js export dist/output.pdf --format pdf --theme paper
scripts.generate:html: mkdir -p dist && ./node_modules/resume-cli/index.js export dist/output.html --format html --theme paper
scripts.generate: npm run generate:pdf && npm run generate:html
